list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add new pull request methods and update SQLite schema
Introduced multiple new methods to the `IPrRepository` interface and its implementation to improve pull request querying capabilities (e.g., by opened/closed dates or ADO pull request IDs). Additionally, updated SQLite database schema, including JSON-related improvements and refined collation settings. These changes enhance functionality and database compatibility.

task.summary:
Add initial solution and application for TheMetz project
Includes .gitignore, a WPF application using .NET 8.0, and ADO pull request data processing services. Also adds project configuration files for Visual Studio and JetBrains Rider IDEs.

Refactor pull request handling and add modular services.
Replaces AdoDataService with modular services for better code structure. Adds PullRequestService, PullRequestCommentService, and TeamMemberService for handling specific functionalities. Introduces new Startup configuration, AppSettings model, and updates workspace settings to support refactored logic and .NET 8.0 WPF application setup.

Add support for closed PR statistics in UI and services
Introduced functionality to fetch and display closed pull request statistics. Added methods to `PullRequestStatsService` for closed PR data processing, UI controls in `MainWindow.xaml/xaml.cs` for displaying closed PR data, and updated data models to handle closed PR links. Refinements were also made to optimize code structure and functionality.

Add functionality to display reviewed PRs in UI
Implemented backend and UI updates to fetch, process, and display reviewed pull requests for each developer. Added methods to `PullRequestStatsService` for reviewed PR handling and extended `MainWindow.xaml` to show corresponding data. Streamlined code by removing unused `PullRequestResponse` models.

Remove unused methods and streamline PR reviewer stats handling.
Removed an unused method from `TeamMemberService` to improve code clarity. Optimized dictionary operations in `PullRequestStatsService` by using `TryAdd` and `TryGetValue` for cleaner handling and reduced redundancy. These changes enhance maintainability and efficiency of the codebase.

Add `PrRepository` with SQLite support and update `MainWindow` logic
Introduced `PrRepository` to handle SQLite-based pull request operations and implemented the required CRUD functionalities. Updated `MainWindow` to integrate `IWorkItemService` and streamlined the PR-related features by removing redundant methods. This lays the foundation for better data handling and interface enhancements.

Add new pull request methods and update SQLite schema
Introduced multiple new methods to the `IPrRepository` interface and its implementation to improve pull request querying capabilities (e.g., by opened/closed dates or ADO pull request IDs). Additionally, updated SQLite database schema, including JSON-related improvements and refined collation settings. These changes enhance functionality and database compatibility.

Add initial solution and application for TheMetz project
Includes .gitignore, a WPF application using .NET 8.0, and ADO pull request data processing services. Also adds project configuration files for Visual Studio and JetBrains Rider IDEs.

Refactor pull request handling and add modular services.
Replaces AdoDataService with modular services for better code structure. Adds PullRequestService, PullRequestCommentService, and TeamMemberService for handling specific functionalities. Introduces new Startup configuration, AppSettings model, and updates workspace settings to support refactored logic and .NET 8.0 WPF application setup.

Add support for closed PR statistics in UI and services
Introduced functionality to fetch and display closed pull request statistics. Added methods to `PullRequestStatsService` for closed PR data processing, UI controls in `MainWindow.xaml/xaml.cs` for displaying closed PR data, and updated data models to handle closed PR links. Refinements were also made to optimize code structure and functionality.

Implemented backend and UI updates to fetch, process, and display reviewed pull requests for each developer. Added methods to `PullRequestStatsService` for reviewed PR handling and extended `MainWindow.xaml` to show corresponding data. Streamlined code by removing unused `PullRequestResponse` models.

Removed an unused method from `TeamMemberService` to improve code clarity. Optimized dictionary operations in `PullRequestStatsService` by using `TryAdd` and `TryGetValue` for cleaner handling and reduced redundancy. These changes enhance maintainability and efficiency of the codebase.

Updated `MainWindow` to integrate `IWorkItemService` and streamlined the PR-related features by removing redundant methods. This lays the foundation for better data handling and interface enhancements.

Add new pull request methods and update SQLite schema
Introduced multiple new methods to the `IPrRepository` interface and its implementation to improve pull request querying capabilities (e.g., by opened/closed dates or ADO pull request IDs). Additionally, updated SQLite database schema, including JSON-related improvements and refined collation settings. These changes enhance functionality and database compatibility.
